name: Cosmic Escape 1999
description:
The solar system you're visiting is starting to collapse. Everything is expanding, and you have to escape as fast as you can. Be quick, space is running out of space.

This game is a little 3D space simulator, where fleeing is the only option.  Default controls are mapped on WASD, shift and space, and mouse for camera/direction.

It's our entry for LDJam 42. We hadn't made any new game creation attempt for a long time, and the Ludum Dare was a good occasion to try again, as well as discovering Godot Engine. We hope to add more levels to this in the future.

Tools used :

  • Godot Engine
  • Blender
  • Krita
  • Gimp
  • Audacity
  • NormalMap Generator
  • SpaceScape
  • Sfmaker

Musical instrument used :
- Nanoloop mono on gameboy
- Korg Volca Keys
- Korg Volca FM

We hope you'll enjoy running out of space!
